Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK Best Instrumentalist: Cornet Player, Wotton Under Edge & District Band
Special Awards (Sunday) Best Percussion of the Day: City of Coventry Best Cornet of the Day: Wotton under Edge & District Best Bass Section of the Day: Kidlington Concert Brass (championship section) Best Tenor Horn of the Day: Wotton under Edge & District
Special Prizes (Whole Contest) Band with the most Under 19 Players: Great Western Youth Band (4th section) Youngest Player of the Weekend: Lyla Ellis, age 9, Yarnton Band (unregistered section)
